abstract: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, which had more than $100 billion of buyout financing pending this summer, is in talks with Citigroup about creating a holding company to buy orphaned leveraged loans.
lead_paragraph: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, which had more than $100 billion of buyout financing pending this summer, is in talks with Citigroup about creating a holding company to buy orphaned leveraged loans.

headline.main: K.K.R. and Citi Are Said to Proceed with Loan Fund
